title: Shopping: General (Usefulness 1)
description: Traveler usefulness 1/10 phrases for the General subcategory within Shopping. Includes 2 card(s).

cards.english: He will buy a house next to the river for his dog.
cards.romaji: Kare wa kawazoi no ie o inu no tame ni kau tsumori desu.
cards.japanese: 彼は川沿いの家を犬のために買うつもりです。

cards.english: When it comes to shopping, Japan is still considered a cash-based society.
cards.romaji: kaimono ni oite wa, nihon wa mada genkin shugi shakai dato iemasu.
cards.japanese: 買い物においては、日本はまだ現金主義社会だと言えます。
